00077     void load_header(int sd, const uint8_t *buf, size_t len) {
00078       header.decode(&buf, &len);
00079       if (header.gid != 0)
00080         thread_group = ((uint64_t)sd << 32) | header.gid;
00081       else
00082         thread_group = 0;
00083     }
